channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A good business

item.title: AI Is Dangerously Similar To Your Mind
item.description: Anthropic's new study on Claude's inner workings shed light on it's 'intentions'. Natural intelligence and artificial intelligence might be more simil...

item.title: OpenAI To Go – Open Source? And News On Project Stargate, Etc.
item.description: Lots of big news for OpenAI involves it position as an American leader in tech, and the new decision to commit to an open source model.

item.title: At The Brink Of Eradicating HIV, America Retreats From Heroism To Hesitation
item.description: Lenacapavir, a once-a-year injection, can treat HIV, prevent transmission, and stop new infections—all with a single shot.

item.title: Apple iPhone 16 And iPhone 16 Plus Prices Slashed In New Sale
item.description: A new sale at Amazon sees the prices of the iPhone 16 series cut, with some prices beating those of the Big Spring Sale.
